name: Care Division
description: This division provides holistic care and support, ensuring members and the surrounding community feel valued and connected.

name: Family Life
description: Focused on fostering strong relationships and personal growth through tailored support for singles, engaged couples, and married individuals.

name: Maturity
description: Dedicated to spiritual growth and development through discipleship, creative content, and worship.

name: People & Performance Division
description: Enhancing leadership, engaging volunteers, promoting learning, and leveraging technology for efficient operations.

name: Communications
description: Responsible for creating and sharing engaging content, managing the church's online presence, and maintaining a strong brand image.

name: Finance and Prayers
description: Manages financial resources, fosters strategic partnerships, supports church projects, and leads prayer initiatives for spiritual and financial growth.

name: Missions
description: Focused on spreading the gospel, supporting new believers, and expanding the church’s reach through local and global missions.

name: Life Groups, Assimilation & Online Church Division
description: Focuses on fostering community, facilitating spiritual growth, and ensuring smooth integration of members both in-person and online.

name: Ministry Operation
description: Ensures smooth service delivery and a welcoming environment for all members and visitors through effective coordination and support services.
